<strong>Why Ellipsis Node?</strong> No bad reviews?

<strong>What do you mean by 'unmanaged'?</strong> I mean vps/containers aren't entered into without your consent and support isn't provided re: software errors/configuration/bugs/etc. At the same time there are multiple techs standing by and I'm often willing to attempt 'best effort' support.

<strong>From $1?</strong> If your curiosity is piqued, why not try an Ellipsis Node vps for $1? To do so, select '$1 trial' from the subscription drop-down menu. I'll send you an invoice for $1 and give you a vps to play around with for a week. If it's not what you're looking for, simply cancel before/at the end of the week and I'll refund the dollar. If you're satisfied and would like to renew, I'll send you a new invoice and we'll go from there.

<strong>Will I get my dollar back if I choose to renew?</strong> You'll receive a partial refund for $1 after renewing the vps.

<strong>Specs?</strong> E5-1620, E5-1650 & X3470 servers with SATA HDD. RAID 1 in MTL, no RAID in LV. Each vps comes with 1 IPv4 address, SolusVM and lots of OS to choose from.

<strong>DDoS protection?</strong> OVH's <a href="http://www.ovh.com/ca/en/anti-ddos/">anti-DDoS mitigation</a>.

<strong>Unmetered?</strong> No overage fees, but your vps will be suspended upon reaching its limit (9Mbps = ~3TB / month, et cetera).

<strong>9Mbps max?</strong> 100Mbps in MTL, 10Mbps in LV. Upgrades are available for the following one-time fees:  
10Mbps - $1  
20Mbps - $2  
30Mbps - $3  
40Mbps - $4  
50Mbps - $5  
60Mbps - $6  
70Mbps - $7  
80Mbps - $8  
90Mbps - $9  
100Mbps - $10

<strong>Extra IPs?</strong> $9 / IPv4 / year or $1 / month. Geolocated American IPs are available. IPv6 = free.

<strong>Nightly backups?</strong> $1 / year.

<strong>Can I pay monthly?</strong> Yep, it's $3.33 per month for every plan.

<strong>Is X allowed?</strong> See the <a href="http://ellipsisno.de/terms/">Terms</a>.

<strong>Test IP?</strong> <a href="http://mtl.ellipsisno.de">http://mtl.ellipsisno.de</a>  

<strong>Further inquiries?</strong> PM or sales@ellipsisno.de. Tailor-made plans (i.e. > 999MB RAM) and subscriptions are available via http://ellipsisno.de/build/.
